game.title: The Lost Treasure
game.description: Embark on a great adventure to find the lost treasure of the ancient civilization. Follow the clues left behind and overcome challenges to uncover the riches.

task.description: Decode the ancient symbols and decipher the location of the treasure map hidden in the old library.
Travel to the haunted cemetery and retrieve the key to the secret chamber where the treasure is kept.
Battle against the powerful guardian of the treasure to gain access to the secret chamber and claim the riches.
